page.title: 11Watling Way School
page.content: In Watling Way Middle school there are between 290 and 310 children.They start school at 8 years old and leave at 12. They dont have a uniform but they do have a school badge.The badge is blue with W.W.on it.The school has 10 classes and a class gypsies.There is another class for children who need special help with learning.In the school there are many pets there are rabbits,finches,budgies,fish, chickens and pigeons.The school has 12 teachers and a Headmaster.The school has no garden.The main punishment used is to keep the offender away from his friends sometimes the offender has to do his work outside the Headmasters office. There are also 4 computers.At lunch time the children have a cafeteria system and buy what dinners they want.First school children have set dinners.Dinner time lasts 1 hour.
